name: Prosciutto-Wrapped Scallops
author: cmmarechal
summary: What makes these scallops special is that they are coated in a tomato olive mix before being wrapped in prosciutto and baked.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place the tomatoes, olives, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper into the bowl of a food processor and pulse until all of the ingredients are well blended and the consistency is almost smooth
Scrape the tomato and olive marinade into a large bowl; toss the scallops in the mixture until well coated
Cut prosciutto slices in half lengthwise and wrap each piece around one scallop
Arrange wrapped scallops on a baking sheet and bake in preheated oven for twenty minutes
